name: LinkedIn
blurb: The best way to make initial contact is through my LinkedIn profileConnect with me!. Thank you!

name: Slack
blurb: In addition to some LaunchCode CoderGirl and Liftoff spaces, I can be found in STL Tech and LaunchCode Community.

name: GitHub
blurb: My GitHub profileSee my work! includes projects I completed as a student, side projects of my own, and many projects I have created for LaunchCode students for extra practice.

name: HackerRank
blurb: When I'm learning a new language or tool I run through practice problems on HackerRankCheck out my skills! and have earned several badges and certifications.

name: YouTube
blurb: Tutorials and lectures I've given for students at LaunchCode can be found on multiple playlists on my YouTube channelCheck out my videos!.
